meanings.definition: To play a series of high cards in one hand and low cards in the other in order to win tricks
meanings.sent1: During the game, I crossruff to strategically win tricks.
meanings.sent2: Players often crossruff to outsmart their opponents in card games.
meanings.sent3: The clever player decided to crossruff, surprising everyone at the table.
meanings.sent4: In the card game, crossruffing felt like executing a brilliant plan.
meanings.sent5: Her ability to crossruff effectively made her a formidable opponent.

meanings.sent1: The crossruff in his hand helped him secure the win.
meanings.sent2: She carefully arranged a crossruff to increase her chances of winning.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected crossruff caused a stir among the players.
meanings.sent4: The crossruff was like a secret weapon hidden in his hand.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of a well-executed crossruff is truly satisfying to witness.
